term.title: uniformly labelled

item.text: A selectively labelled compound where all atoms of a particular element are labelled in the same isotopic ratio.

sources.item: PAC, 1981, 53, 1887. 'Nomenclature of inorganic chemistry: II.1 - Isotopically modified compounds' on page 1895 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198153101887)
